actions.committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology

official_title: To prohibit Federal agencies to require or encourage preferences based on race, sex, or ethnic origin, in connection with Federal contracts.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits Federal agencies from implementing, administering, participating in, or enforcing any requirement of, or program of financial incentives for, set-asides or preferences in Federal contracting or subcontracting based on race, sex, or ethnic origin.

titles.title: To prohibit Federal agencies to require or encourage preferences based on race, sex, or ethnic origin, in connection with Federal contracts.
